channel.title: Jvm on Vishnu Bharathi
channel.description: Recent content in Jvm on Vishnu Bharathi

item.title: Enter the JVM: Part 1
item.description: After deciding to learn about the JVM, I started reading the JVM specification. I felt the need for trying out few things on my machine to get some practical idea about what the specification tries to tell. I am currently reading the Chapter 2: The Structure of the Java Virtual Machine. Here is what I got to learn. Java Virtual Machine Specification The first line states This document specifies an abstract machine.

item.title: Visit the old to understand the new
item.description: Today I made a firm choice. The choice that “I would dig deep into something and learn about it in detail”. The Advice A few years back when I was still in college, I and my friend used to program in a computer science lab that was located near to the office of our teachers. Some teachers drop by sometime and speak with us about various things. Sometimes it would be about the cool new JavaScript framework that we are using in our project and sometimes it would just be about an interesting TV series or movie.
